prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon that looks like a small creature with a shell.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that embodies joy and has a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that has yellow and blue colors with a unique egg-like appearance.
Design a whimsical creature that symbolizes happiness and friendship.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a baby creature emerging from an egg.
Generate a character that has a round body shape and colorful patterns.
Make a Pokemon that is small and resembles a little egg with arms.
